commit.message:
Update apollo-server, aws-sdk, glob-promise, graphql-tag, i18next, i1… (#1031)

* Update apollo-server, aws-sdk, glob-promise, graphql-tag, i18next, i18next-parser, prom-client, validator, mongodb-memory-server
Add .nvmrc matching the node/npm verison expected at build time
Update allow-listed dependencies

* adapt to mongodb-memory-server breaking changes

* adapt to mongodb-memory-server breaking changes, lint"

* add mongodb-memory-server debug

* use mongodb 4.2.17 in automated tests as it is available on all platforms (unlike default mongodb 5.0.2 which is not available on build machine ubunto1604)

* increase test timeout to allow time for mongo to download

* fix python install due to docker alpine > 3.1.1 https://github.com/docker-library/docker/issues/240

Update apollo-server, aws-sdk, glob-promise, graphql-tag, i18next, i1… (#1031)

* Update apollo-server, aws-sdk, glob-promise, graphql-tag, i18next, i18next-parser, prom-client, validator, mongodb-memory-server
Add .nvmrc matching the node/npm verison expected at build time
Update allow-listed dependencies

* adapt to mongodb-memory-server breaking changes

* adapt to mongodb-memory-server breaking changes, lint"

* add mongodb-memory-server debug

* use mongodb 4.2.17 in automated tests as it is available on all platforms (unlike default mongodb 5.0.2 which is not available on build machine ubunto1604)

* increase test timeout to allow time for mongo to download

* fix python install due to docker alpine > 3.1.1 https://github.com/docker-library/docker/issues/240
